tuv.seg: The European Parliament is the institution that represents the citizens of the Member States
Is í Parlaimint na hEorpa an institiúid a dhéanann ionadaíocht ar shaoránaigh na mBall Stát
About 503 million European citizens in 28 countries are currently represented by 766 representatives at the European Parliament
Tá 766 ionadaí i bParlaimint na hEorpa faoi láthair, ag déanamh ionadaíocht ar bheagnach 503 milliún saoránach Eorpach i 28 tír
The Parliament meets and deliberates in public at the Parliament buildings in Strasbourg in France
Buaileann an Pharlaimint le chéile agus déanann sí breithniú go poiblí i bhfoirgnimh na Parlaiminte i Strasbourg sa bhFrainc
The first direct elections to the European Parliament were held in June 1979 and are held every 5 years in the month of June
Bhí na chéad thoghcháin dhíreacha chuig Parlaimint na hEorpa ar siúl i Meitheamh 1979 agus bíonn siad ar siúl gach 5 bliana i mí an Mheithimh
There are a broad range of political groups at the European Parliament
Tá réimse leathan grúpaí polaitiúla i bParlaimint na hEorpa
Usually, MEPs join a political group at the Parliament and sit and vote with that group
Go hiondúil, téann Feisirí Pharlaimint na hEorpa (FPEanna) le grúpa polaitiúil ag an bParlaimint agus suíonn siad agus vótálann siad leis an ngrúpa sin
MEPs of the European Parliment are not obliged to vote with their political groups
Níl iallach ar FPEanna Pharlaimint na hEorpa, áfach, vótáil lena ngrúpa polaitiúil
The European Parliament has an elected president who oversees all the activities of the Parliament and its various parts
Tá uachtarán tofa ag Parlaimint na hEorpa a dhéanann maoirsiú ar ghníomhaíochtaí ar fad na Parlaiminte agus a codanna éagsúla
The Parliament has three main powers:
Tá trí phríomhchumhacht ag an bParlaimint:
• The power to legislate
• An chumhacht reachtaíocht a dhéanamh
This power is shared with the Council of the European Union
Tá an chumhacht seo arna roinnt le Comhairle an Aontais Eorpaigh I bhformhór na gcásanna, déantar dlíthe Eorpacha trí phróiseas comhchinnte
In most situations, European laws are made by a co-decision procedure. This means that the Council and the Parliament jointly adopt law
Ciallaíonn sé seo gur féidir leis an gComhairle agus an Pharlaimint comh-uchtú a dhéanamh ar dhlí
The Parliament can make amendments to legislation under this procedure
Is féidir leis an bParlaimint leasuithe a dhéanamh ar reachtaíocht faoin bpróiseas seo
However, there are certain important areas, for example, tax legislation, where the Parliament may only give an opinion as to whether a proposed piece of legislation can become law

Tá réimsí tábhachtacha áirithe, mar shampla reachtaíocht cánach, áit nach bhfuil de chumhacht ag an bParlaimint ach tuairim a thabhairt cibé an féidir nó nach féidir píosa reachtaíochta atá molta a thabhairt isteach sa dlí
This power is also shared with the Council
Tá an chumhacht seo freisin arna roinnt leis an gComhairle
The Parliament supervises spending by the EU and it also adopts the annual budget for the EU
Déanann an Pharlaimint maoirsiú ar chaiteachas an AE agus glacann sí le buiséad bliantúil an AE freisin
It has the last word on spending on the European Regional Development Fund, the European Social Fund, cultural and educational programmes, humanitarian aid and refugee programmes
Is aici atá an cinneadh deireanach maidir le caiteachas ar Chiste Forbartha Réigiúnaigh na hEorpa, Ciste Sóisialta na hEorpa, cabhair dhaonnúil agus cláir theifigh
However, when it comes to spending on agriculture and spending arising from international agreements, the Parliament can propose modifications but the Council has the final say
Maidir le caiteachas ar thalmhaíocht agus caiteachas a thagann ó chomhaontais idirnáisiúnta, is féidir leis an bParlaimint athruithe a mholadh ach is ag an gComhairle atá an cinneadh deiridh
• The power of democratic supervision
• An chumhacht um maoirsiú daonlathach
It sets up committees of inquiry to investigate certain matters
Déanann an Pharlaimint maoirsiú ar gach gníomhaíocht Chomhphobail
It also plays a crucial role in supervising the European Commission
Bunaíonn sí coistí fiosrúcháin chun fiosrú a dhéanamh ar cheisteanna áirithe
The Commission must submit reports to the Parliament on its activities and must answer written or oral questions during Question Time
Tá ról lárnach aici freisin i maoirsiú Choimisiúin na hEorpa

If two-thirds of the Parliament vote in favour of a motion of censure against the Commission, the entire Commission is forced to resign. The European Parliment also has powers where enlargement of the European Union is concerned
Ní mór don Choimisiún tuairiscí a sheoladh faoi bhráid na Parlaiminte maidir lena ghníomhaíochtaí agus ceisteanna scríofa nó béil a fhreagairt i rith "Tráth na gCeisteanna"

The European Parliment monitors the negotiations between the EU and countries that wish to join the EU, such as, Turkey. At the end of the negotiating process the European Parliment has to agree to their membership of the EU
Má chaitheann dhá thrian den Pharlaimint vóta ar son rúin imcháinte i gcoinne an Choimisiúin, ní mór don Choimisiún iomlán éirí as a bpostanna
Visiting the European Parliament
Cuairt ar Pharlaimint na hEorpa
The Parliament receives groups of visitors in its three places of work, Brussels, Luxembourg and Strasbourg, not only during part-sessions but also outside part-sessions
Glacann an Pharlaimint le grúpaí cuairteoirí ina trí áit oibre, an Bhruiséal, an Lucsamburg agus Strasbourg, ní hamháin le linn páirtsheisiúin ach freisin taobh amuigh de pháirtsheisiúin
Visits last approximately one to three hours and include a talk, given by a European Parliament official, on what the Parliament is and how it works, followed by a question and answer session

Seasann cuairteanna idir uair agus trí uaire an chloig agus mar chuid den chuairt tugann oifigeach de chuid Phairlimint na hEorpa caint ar céard é an Pharlaimint agus conas a oibríonn sí, le seisiún ceisteanna agus freagraí ina ndiaidh
Some visits include a video presentation or an exchange of views with an MEP
Bíonn cur i láthair físeáin nó malartú tuairimí le FPE i gceist i gcuid de na cuairteanna
Find out more information about visiting the European Parliament here
Faigh tuilleadh eolais faoi chuairt a thabhairt ar Pharlaimint na hEorpa anseo
Access to official European Parliamentary documents
Rochtain ar chaipéisí oifigiúla Pharlaimint na hEorpa
The European Parliament's official documents include documents of the parliamentary committees and the interparliamentary delegations, plenary sittings and parliamentary questions
Ar cháipéisí oifigiúla Pharlaimint na hEorpa áirítear cáipéisí na gcoistí parlaiminte agus na toscaireachtaí idirpharlaiminte, seisiúin iomlánacha agus ceisteanna parlaiminte
You can also consult a public register of documents of the European Parliament
Is féidir leat féachaint freisin ar chlár poiblí de cháipéisí de chuid Pharlaimint na hEorpa
Further information can be found in the booklet Access to European Parliament, Council and Commission documents - A user's guide (pdf)
Is féidir tuilleadh eolais a fháil sa leabhrán (pdf)
Europe Direct provides help with using EU websites
Cuireann Europe Direct cabhair ar fáil le húsáid láithreán gréasáin an AE
Your voice in Europe
Do ghlór san Eoraip

European citizenship gives EU citizens the right of free movement and residence in the territory of the Member States, the right to vote and stand for election in European and local elections, the right to diplomatic protection in third countries, as well as:

Tugann saoránacht Eorpach an ceart saor-ghluaiseacht agus saor-chónaí do shaoránaigh an AE i gcríocha na mBall Stát, an ceart vóta a chaitheamh agus seasamh i gcomhair toghchán Eorpach agus áitiúil, an ceart cosaint taidhleoireachta i dtíortha sa tríú domhan, chomh maith le:
• The right to petition the European Parliament
• an ceart achainí a dhéanamh ar Pharlaimint na hEorpa
• The right to bring complaints before the European Ombudsman;
• an ceart gearáin a dhéanamh os comhair Ombudsman na hEorpa
• The right to address any of the Union's institutions or bodies in one of the official languages, including Irish, and to receive an answer in the same language
• an ceart plé le haon institiúid nó comhlacht de chuid an Aontais i gceann de na teangacha oifigiúla, lena n-áirítear Gaeilge, agus freagra a fháil sa teanga chéanna
Members of the public can also obtain information from the European Parliament's information offices in the member states or ask questions via the Citizens' Enquiry Service
Is féidir le baill den phobal eolas a fháil freisin ó oifigí eolais Pharlaimint na hEorpa sna baill stáit nó ceisteanna a chur trí Bhosca Poist na Saoránach

Anyone residing in an EU member state has the right to submit a petition to the European Parliament, individually or as part of a group, on matters concerning them directly which fall within the European Union's remit

Tá ceart ag gach duine atá ina chónaí i mballstát AE achainí a sheoladh chuig Parlaimint na hEorpa, ina aonar nó mar chuid de ghrúpa, le haghaidh ábhar laistigh de théarmaí tagartha Pharlaimint na hEorpa a bhaineann leo go díreach
Contact information for petitions is set out below
Tá sonraí teagmhála le haghaidh achainí leagtha amach thíos
European Parliament Petitions Committee
Coiste Achainíocha Phairlimint na hEorpa

Cathaoirleach an Choiste Achainíocha
